intro: This document serves as both a Product Specification and User Manual for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) CLC+ Backbone Raster Product 2021. It provides comprehensive information regarding the product's characteristics, production methodologies, and quality assessments. Specifically, the manual details the technical specifications of the CLC+ Backbone Raster Product, including its nomenclature, classification approach, and post-processing steps, as well as summarising the internal validation results. This information is intended for users who require in-depth knowledge for advanced analyses and applications of the data.
